item.description: New to the Cumberland area, Valerie Redpath and her family are in the process of installing their first garden at their new home located on a slope. Join Permaculture Designer David Homa for a workshop on sheet mulching and constructing terraced gardens on a slope. Â Hold in nutrients, maintain stable soil moisture, and create long standing planting areas. This is a hands on workshop. We will discuss materials, process, and planting using no-till techniques. Lunch will be potluck. Please wear boots and bring gloves!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Creating sheet mulched, Terraced garden beds on contour
